WorkBadge.name: WorkBadge
WorkBadge.description: Represents information about who the badge was given to and which badge was given. A WorkBadge record is created for each recipient of a WorkBadgeDefinition.

DefinitionId.description: Required. Salesforce unique ID for the given WorkBadgeDefinition record given.

GiverId.description: The ID of the badge giver. Can’t be the same as RecipientId.

ImageUrl.description: The URL of the badge image.

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this WorkBadge.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this WorkBadge. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Message.description: The message accompanying the thanks badge.

NetworkId.description: The ID of the community that this WorkBadge is associated with. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org.

RecipientId.description: Required. Salesforce unique ID for User who is the Recipient of Badge. Can’t be the same as GiverId

RewardId.description: Salesforce unique ID for Reward given with badge (if Reward Badge)

SourceId.description: Salesforce unique ID for Thanks record referenced to this badge.
